entries.journal_entry_description: The bully spoke of sabotage in the lower levels! A renegade syndicate going by the name of Genesis Red. You should check it out and make sure everything is as it should be.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You need to go to the lower level and look into who is sabotaging the station.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Lower Level
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The Genesis Red thugs have stationed guards outside the Data Storage Room while they work. Defeat 3 of the cronies.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Kill 3 Genesis Red Cronies Near the Data Storage Room.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The Genesis Red thugs will not be weakened sufficiently until their leaders are defeated.  Kill one of their officers.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Kill a Genesis Red Officer in the Data Storage Room
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Now that you have a good idea of who is sabotaging the station, use the elevator to return to the main level. You need to inform Rydel.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to return to the Main Level
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Rydel to tell him what you have discovered.
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Return to Rydel in the Close Combat Training Room
